sentences.sentence: This newspaper has achieved a reputation for honest and impartial political reporting.
sentences.translation: 这家报纸凭诚实公正的政治报道赢得了声誉。

sentences.sentence: As chairman, I must remain impartial.
sentences.translation: 作为主席，我必须保持中立。

sentences.sentence: It can help to have an impartial third party look over your work.
sentences.translation: 让中立的第3方来检查你的工作会有所帮助。
